title: authentication problem
body: hey goodnight guys, i've been trying to log in for an hour now and it keeps authenticating and not logging in, minutes on end, even up to ten minutes. what do i do? is my game broken in some way or something? please help. thanks much <3

replies.body: Hmmmm there don't seem to be any current NA server issues, or rather around the time that you were trying to login. Double check you network settings for anything that might be out of place by following our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). There are a couple steps about port forwarding and DNS that should be able to help.
